about_the_game:
EcoGenesis is a 2D black-box ecosystem simulator where you need to craft an ecosystem that can withstand the test of time. Starting with just a single-cell organism, you must unlock creatures and balance your environment while driving towards one of the three victory conditions in this turn-based simulation.

Over 100 Different Animal Species
• Unlock and craft a multitude of different animals from land-dwellers like the bear and elephant to sea-creatures such as the blue whale and orca.
• 10+ dinosaur species including the Rex and the Brontosaurus.
• Each creature has a unique set of stats that changes the way it impacts the environment, the amount of resources it gives per turn, and how much it costs to craft.
• Upgrade your creatures! Each organism has three unique hand-drawn sprites corresponding to their level.
• Most creatures have abilites - make sure to pay attention to what they do!

14x Different Resources to Manage
• Carefully manage your resources to allow you to craft and upgrade more animals to put into your environment.
• Each resource has a unique hand-drawn sprite.

Over 1000x Quiz Questions Corresponding to Each Resource Type!

Balance Your Ecosystem's 5x Key Traits - water, foliage, herbivores, carnivores, and temperature. Each one impacts the ecosystem in a unique way, so make sure to keep a keen eye on them.

6x Different Weather Conditions - ranging from hurricanes to solar flares!

A Multitude of Events - will your ecosystem be ravaged by a deadly flood, or will rains bring good luck to the riverbanks?

30+ Missions

30+ Achievements

3x Victory Conditions - Biomass, Crafting Creatures, and Completing Missions.

highlighted.name: Where We're Going We Don't Need Trees
